member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyImpulseHelper.EqualizeAmount
member.summary: Sets the EqualizeAmount setting for this 0 means straight impulse, 1 means multiply by the mass (change in velocity).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyImpulseHelper.PartIndex
member.summary: Sets the PartIndex setting for this index of part being hit. -1 apply impulse to COM..
member.remarks: Default value = 0 Min value = -1 Max value = 28

member.summary: Sets the Impulse setting for this impulse vector (impulse is change in momentum).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyImpulseHelper.HitPoint
member.summary: Sets the HitPoint setting for this optional point on part where hit. If not supplied then the impulse is applied at the part centre..
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f)

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyImpulseHelper.LocalHitPointInfo
member.summary: Sets the LocalHitPointInfo setting for this hitPoint in local coordinates of bodyPart.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyImpulseHelper.LocalImpulseInfo
member.summary: Sets the LocalImpulseInfo setting for this impulse in local coordinates of bodyPart.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyImpulseHelper.AngularImpulse
member.summary: Sets the AngularImpulse setting for this impulse should be considered an angular impulse.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyBulletImpulseHelper.PartIndex
member.summary: Sets the PartIndex setting for this index of part being hit..

member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ApplyBulletImpulseHelper.ExtraShare
member.summary: Sets the ExtraShare setting for this if not 0.0 then have an extra bullet applied to spine0 (approximates the COM). Uses setup from configureBulletsExtra. 0-1 shared 0.0 = no extra bullet, 0.5 = impulse split equally between extra and bullet, 1.0 only extra bullet. LT 0.0 then bullet + scaled extra bullet. Eg.-0.5 = bullet + 0.5 impulse extra bullet.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = -2.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRelaxHelper.Damping

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRelaxHelper.Mask

member.remarks: Default value = fb

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRelaxHelper.HoldPose
member.summary: Sets the HoldPose setting for this automatically hold the current pose as the character relaxes - can be used to avoid relaxing into a t-pose.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRelaxHelper.DisableJointDriving
member.summary: Sets the DisableJointDriving setting for this sets the drive state to free - this reduces drifting on the ground.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper
member.summary: This single message allows you to configure various parameters used on any behaviour that uses the dynamic balance.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ConfigureBalanceHelper for sending a ConfigureBalance to a given
member.param: The to send the ConfigureBalance to.
member.remarks: This single message allows you to configure various parameters used on any behaviour that uses the dynamic balance.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StepHeight
member.summary: Sets the StepHeight setting for this maximum height that character steps vertically (above 0.2 is high...but ok for say underwater).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 0.4f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StepHeightInc4Step
member.summary: Sets the StepHeightInc4Step setting for this added to stepHeight if going up steps.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 0.4f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LegsApartRestep
member.summary: Sets the LegsApartRestep setting for this if the legs end up more than (legsApartRestep + hipwidth) apart even though balanced, take another step.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LegsTogetherRestep
member.summary: Sets the LegsTogetherRestep setting for this mmmm0.1 for drunk if the legs end up less than (hipwidth - legsTogetherRestep) apart even though balanced, take another step. A value of 1 will turn off this feature and the max value is hipWidth = 0.23f by default but is model dependent.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LegsApartMax
member.summary: Sets the LegsApartMax setting for this FRICTION WORKAROUND: if the legs end up more than (legsApartMax + hipwidth) apart when balanced, adjust the feet positions to slide back so they are legsApartMax + hipwidth apart. Needs to be less than legsApartRestep to see any effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.TaperKneeStrength
member.summary: Sets the TaperKneeStrength setting for this does the knee strength reduce with angle.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LegStiffness
member.summary: Sets the LegStiffness setting for this stiffness of legs.
member.remarks: Default value = 12.0f Min value = 6.0f Max value = 16.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LeftLegSwingDamping
member.summary: Sets the LeftLegSwingDamping setting for this damping of left leg during swing phase (mmmmDrunk used 1.25 to slow legs movement).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.2f Max value = 4.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.RightLegSwingDamping
member.summary: Sets the RightLegSwingDamping setting for this damping of right leg during swing phase (mmmmDrunk used 1.25 to slow legs movement).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.2f Max value = 4.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.OpposeGravityLegs
member.summary: Sets the OpposeGravityLegs setting for this Gravity opposition applied to hips and knees.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 4.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.OpposeGravityAnkles
member.summary: Sets the OpposeGravityAnkles setting for this Gravity opposition applied to ankles. General balancer likes 1.0. StaggerFall likes 0.1.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 4.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LeanAcc
member.summary: Sets the LeanAcc setting for this Multiplier on the floorAcceleration added to the lean.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.HipLeanAcc
member.summary: Sets the HipLeanAcc setting for this Multiplier on the floorAcceleration added to the leanHips.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LeanAccMax
member.summary: Sets the LeanAccMax setting for this Max floorAcceleration allowed for lean and leanHips.
member.remarks: Default value = 5.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.ResistAcc
member.summary: Sets the ResistAcc setting for this Level of cheat force added to character to resist the effect of floorAcceleration (anti-Acceleration) - added to upperbody..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.ResistAccMax
member.summary: Sets the ResistAccMax setting for this Max floorAcceleration allowed for anti-Acceleration. If GT 20.0 then it is probably in a crash.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FootSlipCompOnMovingFloor
member.summary: Sets the FootSlipCompOnMovingFloor setting for this This parameter will be removed when footSlipCompensation preserves the foot angle on a moving floor]. If the character detects a moving floor and footSlipCompOnMovingFloor is false then it will turn off footSlipCompensation - at footSlipCompensation preserves the global heading of the feet. If footSlipCompensation is off then the character usually turns to the side in the end although when turning the vehicle turns it looks promising for a while.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.AnkleEquilibrium
member.summary: Sets the AnkleEquilibrium setting for this ankle equilibrium angle used when static balancing.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.ExtraFeetApart
member.summary: Sets the ExtraFeetApart setting for this additional feet apart setting.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.DontStepTime
member.summary: Sets the DontStepTime setting for this amount of time at the start of a balance before the character is allowed to start stepping.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.BalanceAbortThreshold
member.summary: Sets the BalanceAbortThreshold setting for this when the character gives up and goes into a fall. Larger values mean that the balancer can lean more before failing..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.GiveUpHeight
member.summary: Sets the GiveUpHeight setting for this height between lowest foot and COM below which balancer will give up.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.5f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StepClampScale
member.summary: Sets the StepClampScale setting for this
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StepClampScaleVariance
member.summary: Sets the StepClampScaleVariance setting for this Variance in clamp scale every step. if negative only takes away from clampScale.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.PredictionTimeHip
member.summary: Sets the PredictionTimeHip setting for this amount of time (seconds) into the future that the character tries to move hip to (kind of). Will be controlled by balancer in future but can help recover spine quicker from bending forwards to much..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.PredictionTime
member.summary: Sets the PredictionTime setting for this amount of time (seconds) into the future that the character tries to step to. bigger values try to recover with fewer, bigger steps. smaller values recover with smaller steps, and generally recover less..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.PredictionTimeVariance
member.summary: Sets the PredictionTimeVariance setting for this Variance in predictionTime every step. if negative only takes away from predictionTime.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.MaxSteps
member.summary: Sets the MaxSteps setting for this Maximum number of steps that the balancer will take..
member.remarks: Default value = 100 Min value = 1

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.MaxBalanceTime
member.summary: Sets the MaxBalanceTime setting for this Maximum time(seconds) that the balancer will balance for..
member.remarks: Default value = 50.0f Min value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.ExtraSteps
member.summary: Sets the ExtraSteps setting for this Allow the balancer to take this many more steps before hitting maxSteps. If negative nothing happens(safe default).
member.remarks: Default value = -1 Min value = -1

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.ExtraTime
member.summary: Sets the ExtraTime setting for this Allow the balancer to balance for this many more seconds before hitting maxBalanceTime. If negative nothing happens(safe default).
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f Min value = -1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FallType
member.summary: Sets the FallType setting for this How to fall after maxSteps or maxBalanceTime
member.remarks: Default value = If BCR has to be active

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FallMult
member.summary: Sets the FallMult setting for this Multiply the rampDown of stiffness on falling by this amount ( GT 1 fall quicker).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 100.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FallReduceGravityComp
member.summary: Sets the FallReduceGravityComp setting for this Reduce gravity compensation as the legs weaken on falling.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.RampHipPitchOnFail
member.summary: Sets the RampHipPitchOnFail setting for this bend over when falling after maxBalanceTime.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StableLinSpeedThresh
member.summary: Sets the StableLinSpeedThresh setting for this Linear speed threshold for successful balance..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StableRotSpeedThresh
member.summary: Sets the StableRotSpeedThresh setting for this Rotational speed threshold for successful balance..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FailMustCollide
member.summary: Sets the FailMustCollide setting for this The upper body of the character must be colliding and other failure conditions met to fail.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.IgnoreFailure
member.summary: Sets the IgnoreFailure setting for this Ignore maxSteps and maxBalanceTime and try to balance forever.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.ChangeStepTime
member.summary: Sets the ChangeStepTime setting for this time not in contact (airborne) before step is changed. If -ve don't change step.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 5.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.BalanceIndefinitely
member.summary: Sets the BalanceIndefinitely setting for this Ignore maxSteps and maxBalanceTime and try to balance forever.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.MovingFloor
member.summary: Sets the MovingFloor setting for this temporary variable to ignore movingFloor code that generally causes the character to fall over if the feet probe a moving object e.g. treading on a gun.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.AirborneStep
member.summary: Sets the AirborneStep setting for this when airborne try to step. Set to false for e.g. shotGun reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.UseComDirTurnVelThresh
member.summary: Sets the UseComDirTurnVelThresh setting for this Velocity below which the balancer turns in the direction of the COM forward instead of the ComVel - for use with shot from running with high upright constraint use 1.9.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.MinKneeAngle
member.summary: Sets the MinKneeAngle setting for this Minimum knee angle (-ve value will mean this functionality is not applied). 0.4 seems a good value.
member.remarks: Default value = -0.5f Min value = -0.5f Max value = 1.5f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FlatterSwingFeet
member.summary: Sets the FlatterSwingFeet setting for this
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FlatterStaticFeet
member.summary: Sets the FlatterStaticFeet setting for this
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.AvoidLeg
member.summary: Sets the AvoidLeg setting for this If true then balancer tries to avoid leg2leg collisions/avoid crossing legs. Avoid tries to not step across a line of the inside of the stance leg's foot.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.AvoidFootWidth
member.summary: Sets the AvoidFootWidth setting for this NB. Very sensitive. Avoid tries to not step across a line of the inside of the stance leg's foot. avoidFootWidth = how much inwards from the ankle this line is in (m)..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.AvoidFeedback
member.summary: Sets the AvoidFeedback setting for this NB. Very sensitive. Avoid tries to not step across a line of the inside of the stance leg's foot. Avoid doesn't allow the desired stepping foot to cross the line. avoidFeedback = how much of the actual crossing of that line is fedback as an error..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LeanAgainstVelocity
member.summary: Sets the LeanAgainstVelocity setting for this
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StepDecisionThreshold
member.summary: Sets the StepDecisionThreshold setting for this
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StepIfInSupport
member.summary: Sets the StepIfInSupport setting for this The balancer sometimes decides to step even if balanced.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.AlwaysStepWithFarthest
member.summary: Sets the AlwaysStepWithFarthest setting for this
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.StandUp
member.summary: Sets the StandUp setting for this standup more with increased velocity.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.DepthFudge
member.summary: Sets the DepthFudge setting for this Supposed to increase foot friction: Impact depth of a collision with the foot is changed when the balancer is running - impact.SetDepth(impact.GetDepth() - depthFudge).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.DepthFudgeStagger
member.summary: Sets the DepthFudgeStagger setting for this Supposed to increase foot friction: Impact depth of a collision with the foot is changed when staggerFall is running - impact.SetDepth(impact.GetDepth() - depthFudgeStagger).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FootFriction
member.summary: Sets the FootFriction setting for this Foot friction multiplier is multiplied by this amount if balancer is running.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 40.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.FootFrictionStagger
member.summary: Sets the FootFrictionStagger setting for this Foot friction multiplier is multiplied by this amount if staggerFall is running.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 40.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.BackwardsLeanCutoff
member.summary: Sets the BackwardsLeanCutoff setting for this Backwards lean threshold to cut off stay upright forces. 0.0 Vertical - 1.0 horizontal. 0.6 is a sensible value. NB: the balancer does not fail in order to give stagger that extra step as it falls. A backwards lean of GT 0.6 will generally mean the balancer will soon fail without stayUpright forces..
member.remarks: Default value = 1.1f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.GiveUpHeightEnd
member.summary: Sets the GiveUpHeightEnd setting for this if this value is different from giveUpHeight, actual giveUpHeight will be ramped toward this value.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.5f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.BalanceAbortThresholdEnd
member.summary: Sets the BalanceAbortThresholdEnd setting for this if this value is different from balanceAbortThreshold, actual balanceAbortThreshold will be ramped toward this value.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.GiveUpRampDuration
member.summary: Sets the GiveUpRampDuration setting for this duration of ramp from start of behaviour for above two parameters. If smaller than 0, no ramp is applied.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceHelper.LeanToAbort
member.summary: Sets the LeanToAbort setting for this lean at which to send abort message when maxSteps or maxBalanceTime is reached.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceResetHelper
member.summary: reset the values configurable by the Configure Balance message to their defaults.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBalanceResetHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ConfigureBalanceResetHelper for sending a ConfigureBalanceReset to a given
member.param: The to send the ConfigureBalanceReset to.
member.remarks: reset the values configurable by the Configure Balance message to their defaults.

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper
member.summary: this single message allows to configure self avoidance for the character.BBDD Self avoidance tech.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper for sending a ConfigureSelfAvoidance to a given
member.param: The to send the ConfigureSelfAvoidance to.
member.remarks: this single message allows to configure self avoidance for the character.BBDD Self avoidance tech.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.UseSelfAvoidance
member.summary: Sets the UseSelfAvoidance setting for this Enable or disable self avoidance tech..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.OverwriteDragReduction
member.summary: Sets the OverwriteDragReduction setting for this Specify whether self avoidance tech should use original IK input target or the target that has been already modified by getStabilisedPos() tech i.e. function that compensates for rotational and linear velocity of shoulder/thigh..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.TorsoSwingFraction
member.summary: Sets the TorsoSwingFraction setting for this Place the adjusted target this much along the arc between effector (wrist) and target, value in range [0,1]..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.8f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.MaxTorsoSwingAngleRad
member.summary: Sets the MaxTorsoSwingAngleRad setting for this Max value on the effector (wrist) to adjusted target offset..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.8f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.6f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.SelfAvoidIfInSpineBoundsOnly
member.summary: Sets the SelfAvoidIfInSpineBoundsOnly setting for this Restrict self avoidance to operate on targets that are within character torso bounds only..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.SelfAvoidAmount
member.summary: Sets the SelfAvoidAmount setting for this Amount of self avoidance offset applied when angle from effector (wrist) to target is greater then right angle i.e. when total offset is a blend between where effector currently is to value that is a product of total arm length and selfAvoidAmount. SelfAvoidAmount is in a range between [0, 1]..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.OverwriteTwist
member.summary: Sets the OverwriteTwist setting for this Overwrite desired IK twist with self avoidance procedural twist..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.UsePolarPathAlgorithm
member.summary: Sets the UsePolarPathAlgorithm setting for this Use the alternative self avoidance algorithm that is based on linear and polar target blending. WARNING: It only requires "radius" in terms of parametrization..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSelfAvoidanceHelper.Radius
member.summary: Sets the Radius setting for this Self avoidance radius, measured out from the spine axis along the plane perpendicular to that axis. The closer is the proximity of reaching target to that radius, the more polar (curved) motion is used for offsetting the target. WARNING: Parameter only used by the alternative algorithm that is based on linear and polar target blending..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ConfigureBulletsHelper for sending a ConfigureBullets to a given
member.param: The to send the ConfigureBullets to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseSpreadOverParts
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseSpreadOverParts setting for this spreads impulse across parts. currently only for spine parts, not limbs..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseLeakageStrengthScaled
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseLeakageStrengthScaled setting for this for weaker characters subsequent impulses remain strong.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulsePeriod
member.summary: Sets the ImpulsePeriod setting for this duration that impulse is spread over (triangular shaped).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseTorqueScale
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseTorqueScale setting for this An impulse applied at a point on a body equivalent to an impulse at the centre of the body and a torque. This parameter scales the torque component. (The torque component seems to be excite the rage looseness bug which sends the character in a sometimes wildly different direction to an applied impulse).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.LoosenessFix
member.summary: Sets the LoosenessFix setting for this Fix the rage looseness bug by applying only the impulse at the centre of the body unless it is a spine part then apply the twist component only of the torque as well..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseDelay
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseDelay setting for this time from hit before impulses are being applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseReductionPerShot
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseReductionPerShot setting for this by how much are subsequent impulses reduced (e.g. 0.0: no reduction, 0.1: 10% reduction each new hit).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseRecovery
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseRecovery setting for this recovery rate of impulse strength per second (impulse strength from 0.0:1.0). At 60fps a impulseRecovery=60.0 will recover in 1 frame.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 60.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.ImpulseMinLeakage
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseMinLeakage setting for this the minimum amount of impulse leakage allowed.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueMode
member.summary: Sets the TorqueMode setting for this
member.remarks: Default value = If - proportional to character strength, can reduce impulse amount If - no reduction of impulse and not proportional to character strength

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueSpinMode
member.summary: Sets the TorqueSpinMode setting for this
member.remarks: Default value = If a burst effect is achieved

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueFilterMode
member.summary: Sets the TorqueFilterMode setting for this
member.remarks: Default value =

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueAlwaysSpine3
member.summary: Sets the TorqueAlwaysSpine3 setting for this always apply torques to spine3 instead of actual part hit.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueDelay
member.summary: Sets the TorqueDelay setting for this time from hit before torques are being applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorquePeriod
member.summary: Sets the TorquePeriod setting for this duration of torque.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueGain
member.summary: Sets the TorqueGain setting for this multiplies impulse magnitude to arrive at torque that is applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueCutoff
member.summary: Sets the TorqueCutoff setting for this minimum ratio of impulse that remains after converting to torque (if in strength-proportional mode).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.TorqueReductionPerTick

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsHelper.RbLowerShare
member.summary: Sets the RbLowerShare setting for this rigid body response is shared between the upper and lower body (rbUpperShare = 1-rbLowerShare). rbLowerShare=0.5 gives upper and lower share scaled by mass. i.e. if 70% ub mass and 30% lower mass then rbLowerShare=0.5 gives actualrbShare of 0.7ub and 0.3lb. rbLowerShare GT 0.5 scales the ub share down from 0.7 and the lb up from 0.3..

member.summary: Sets the ImpulseSpreadOverParts setting for this spreads impulse across parts. currently only for spine parts, not limbs..

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.ImpulseTorqueScale
member.summary: Sets the ImpulseTorqueScale setting for this An impulse applied at a point on a body equivalent to an impulse at the centre of the body and a torque. This parameter scales the torque component. (The torque component seems to be excite the rage looseness bug which sends the character in a sometimes wildly different direction to an applied impulse).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.LoosenessFix
member.summary: Sets the LoosenessFix setting for this Fix the rage looseness bug by applying only the impulse at the centre of the body unless it is a spine part then apply the twist component only of the torque as well..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.RbMaxTwistMomentArmOneLeg
member.summary: Sets the RbMaxTwistMomentArmOneLeg setting for this if only one leg in contact: Maximum twist arm moment of bullet applied.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.RbMaxBroomMomentArmOneLeg
member.summary: Sets the RbMaxBroomMomentArmOneLeg setting for this if only one leg in contact: Maximum broom((everything but the twist) arm moment of bullet applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.RbTwistAxis
member.summary: Sets the RbTwistAxis setting for this
member.remarks: Default value =

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureBulletsExtraHelper.RbPivot
member.summary: Sets the RbPivot setting for this if false pivot around COM always, if true change pivot depending on foot contact: to feet centre if both feet in contact, or foot position if 1 foot in contact or COM position if no feet in contact.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper
member.summary: Enable/disable/edit character limits in real time. This adjusts limits in RAGE-native space and will *not* reorient the joint.

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ConfigureLimitsHelper for sending a ConfigureLimits to a given
member.param: The to send the ConfigureLimits to.
member.remarks: Enable/disable/edit character limits in real time. This adjusts limits in RAGE-native space and will *not* reorient the joint.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Mask
member.summary: Sets the Mask setting for this Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value for joint limits to configure. Ignored if index != -1..
member.remarks: Default value = fb

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Enable
member.summary: Sets the Enable setting for this If false, disable (set all to PI, -PI) limits..
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.ToDesired
member.summary: Sets the ToDesired setting for this If true, set limits to accommodate current desired angles.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Restore
member.summary: Sets the Restore setting for this Return to cached defaults?.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.ToCurAnimation
member.summary: Sets the ToCurAnimation setting for this If true, set limits to the current animated limits.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Index
member.summary: Sets the Index setting for this Index of effector to configure. Set to -1 to use mask..
member.remarks: Default value = -1 Min value = -1

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Lean1
member.summary: Sets the Lean1 setting for this Custom limit values to use if not setting limits to desired. Limits are RAGE-native, not NM-wrapper-native..
member.remarks: Default value = 1.6f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 3.1f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Lean2
member.summary: Sets the Lean2 setting for this
member.remarks: Default value = 1.6f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 3.1f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Twist
member.summary: Sets the Twist setting for this
member.remarks: Default value = 1.6f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 3.1f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureLimitsHelper.Margin
member.summary: Sets the Margin setting for this Joint limit margin to add to current animation limits when using those to set runtime limits..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 3.1f

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSoftLimitHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ConfigureSoftLimitHelper for sending a ConfigureSoftLimit to a given
member.param: The to send the ConfigureSoftLimit to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSoftLimitHelper.Index
member.summary: Sets the Index setting for this Select limb that the soft limit is going to be applied to.
member.remarks: Default value = 0 Min value = 0 Max value = 3

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSoftLimitHelper.Stiffness
member.summary: Sets the Stiffness setting for this Stiffness of the soft limit. Parameter is used to calculate spring term that contributes to the desired acceleration..
member.remarks: Default value = 15.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 30.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSoftLimitHelper.Damping
member.summary: Sets the Damping setting for this Damping of the soft limit. Parameter is used to calculate damper term that contributes to the desired acceleration. To have the system critically dampened set it to 1.0..
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.9f Max value = 1.1f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSoftLimitHelper.LimitAngle
member.summary: Sets the LimitAngle setting for this Soft limit angle. Positive angle in RAD, measured relatively either from hard limit maxAngle (approach direction = -1) or minAngle (approach direction = 1). This angle will be clamped if outside the joint hard limit range..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 6.3f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSoftLimitHelper.ApproachDirection
member.summary: Sets the ApproachDirection setting for this Limit angle can be measured relatively to joints hard limit minAngle or maxAngle. Set approachDirection to +1 to measure soft limit angle relatively to hard limit minAngle that corresponds to the maximum stretch of the elbow. Set it to -1 to measure soft limit angle relatively to hard limit maxAngle that corresponds to the maximum stretch of the knee..
member.remarks: Default value = 1 Min value = -1 Max value = 1

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureSoftLimitHelper.VelocityScaled
member.summary: Sets the VelocityScaled setting for this Scale stiffness based on character angular velocity..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.summary: Sets the HipRoll setting for this Amount of hip roll.

member.summary: Sets the ForceStep setting for this force a step to be taken whether pushed out of balance or not.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.StepTurn
member.summary: Sets the StepTurn setting for this turn the character using the balancer.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.summary: Sets the VelMultiplierStart setting for this Start velocity where parameters begin to be ramped down to zero linearly.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.summary: Sets the VelMultiplierEnd setting for this End velocity of ramp where parameters are scaled to zero.
member.remarks: Default value = 5.0f Min value = 1.0f Max value = 40.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.VelForceStep
member.summary: Sets the VelForceStep setting for this Velocity above which a step is not forced.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.8f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.VelStepTurn
member.summary: Sets the VelStepTurn setting for this Velocity above which a stepTurn is not asked for.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.8f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ConfigureShotInjuredArmHelper.VelScales
member.summary: Sets the VelScales setting for this Use the velocity scaling parameters. Tune for standing still then use velocity scaling to make sure a running character stays balanced (the turning tends to make the character fall over more at speed).
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.summary: Sets the UseForces setting for this enable force based constraint.

member.summary: Sets the UseTorques setting for this enable torque based constraint.

member.summary: Sets the LastStandMode setting for this Uses position/orientation control on the spine and drifts in the direction of bullets. This ignores all other stayUpright settings..

member.summary: Sets the LastStandSinkRate setting for this The sink rate (higher for a faster drop)..

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.LastStandHorizDamping
member.summary: Sets the LastStandHorizDamping setting for this Higher values for more damping.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.TurnTowardsBullets
member.summary: Sets the TurnTowardsBullets setting for this Use cheat torques to face the direction of bullets if not facing too far away.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.VelocityBased
member.summary: Sets the VelocityBased setting for this make strength of constraint function of COM velocity. Uses -1 for forceDamping if the damping is positive..

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.TorqueOnlyInAir
member.summary: Sets the TorqueOnlyInAir setting for this only apply torque based constraint when airBorne.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.ForceStrength
member.summary: Sets the ForceStrength setting for this strength of constraint.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 16.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.ForceDamping
member.summary: Sets the ForceDamping setting for this damping in constraint: -1 makes it scale automagically with forceStrength. Other negative values will scale this automagic damping..
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 50.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.ForceFeetMult
member.summary: Sets the ForceFeetMult setting for this multiplier to the force applied to the feet.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.ForceSpine3Share
member.summary: Sets the ForceSpine3Share setting for this share of pelvis force applied to spine3.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.ForceLeanReduction
member.summary: Sets the ForceLeanReduction setting for this how much the character lean is taken into account when reducing the force..
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.ForceInAirShare
member.summary: Sets the ForceInAirShare setting for this share of the feet force to the airborne foot.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.ForceMin
member.summary: Sets the ForceMin setting for this when min and max are greater than 0 the constraint strength is determined from character strength, scaled into the range given by min and max.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 16.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.ForceMax
member.summary: Sets the ForceMax setting for this see above.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 16.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.ForceSaturationVel
member.summary: Sets the ForceSaturationVel setting for this when in velocityBased mode, the COM velocity at which constraint reaches maximum strength (forceStrength).
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f Min value = 0.1f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.ForceThresholdVel
member.summary: Sets the ForceThresholdVel setting for this when in velocityBased mode, the COM velocity above which constraint starts applying forces.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 5.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.TorqueStrength
member.summary: Sets the TorqueStrength setting for this strength of torque based constraint.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 16.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.TorqueDamping
member.summary: Sets the TorqueDamping setting for this damping of torque based constraint.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 16.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.TorqueSaturationVel
member.summary: Sets the TorqueSaturationVel setting for this when in velocityBased mode, the COM velocity at which constraint reaches maximum strength (torqueStrength).
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f Min value = 0.1f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.TorqueThresholdVel
member.summary: Sets the TorqueThresholdVel setting for this when in velocityBased mode, the COM velocity above which constraint starts applying torques.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.5f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 5.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.SupportPosition
member.summary: Sets the SupportPosition setting for this distance the foot is behind Com projection that is still considered able to generate the support for the upright constraint.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f Min value = -2.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.NoSupportForceMult
member.summary: Sets the NoSupportForceMult setting for this still apply this fraction of the upright constaint force if the foot is not in a position (defined by supportPosition) to generate the support for the upright constraint.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.StepUpHelp
member.summary: Sets the StepUpHelp setting for this strength of cheat force applied upwards to spine3 to help the character up steps/slopes.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 16.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.StayUpAcc
member.summary: Sets the StayUpAcc setting for this How much the cheat force takes into account the acceleration of moving platforms.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.StayUprightHelper.StayUpAccMax
member.summary: Sets the StayUpAccMax setting for this The maximum floorAcceleration (of a moving platform) that the cheat force takes into account.
member.remarks: Default value = 5.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 15.0f

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper
member.summary: Sets the type of reaction if catchFall is called

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the SetFallingReactionHelper for sending a SetFallingReaction to a given
member.param: The to send the SetFallingReaction to.
member.remarks: Sets the type of reaction if catchFall is called

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.HandsAndKnees
member.summary: Sets the HandsAndKnees setting for this set to true to get handsAndKnees catchFall if catchFall called. If true allows the dynBalancer to stay on during the catchfall and modifies the catch fall to give a more alive looking performance (hands and knees for front landing or sitting up for back landing).
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.CallRDS
member.summary: Sets the CallRDS setting for this If true catchFall will call rollDownstairs if comVel GT comVelRDSThresh - prevents excessive sliding in catchFall. Was previously only true for handsAndKnees.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.ComVelRDSThresh
member.summary: Sets the ComVelRDSThresh setting for this comVel above which rollDownstairs will start - prevents excessive sliding in catchFall.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.ResistRolling
member.summary: Sets the ResistRolling setting for this For rds catchFall only: True to resist rolling motion (rolling motion is set off by ub contact and a sliding velocity), false to allow more of a continuous rolling (rolling motion is set off at a sliding velocity).
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.ArmReduceSpeed
member.summary: Sets the ArmReduceSpeed setting for this Strength is reduced in the catchFall when the arms contact the ground. 0.2 is good for handsAndKnees. 2.5 is good for normal catchFall, anything lower than 1.0 for normal catchFall may lead to bad catchFall poses..
member.remarks: Default value = 2.5f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.ReachLengthMultiplier
member.summary: Sets the ReachLengthMultiplier setting for this Reach length multiplier that scales characters arm topological length, value in range from (0, 1 GT where 1.0 means reach length is maximum..
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.3f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.InhibitRollingTime
member.summary: Sets the InhibitRollingTime setting for this Time after hitting ground that the catchFall can call rds.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.ChangeFrictionTime
member.summary: Sets the ChangeFrictionTime setting for this Time after hitting ground that the catchFall can change the friction of parts to inhibit sliding.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.GroundFriction
member.summary: Sets the GroundFriction setting for this 8.0 was used on yanked) Friction multiplier on bodyParts when on ground. Character can look too slidy with groundFriction = 1. Higher values give a more jerky reation but this seems timestep dependent especially for dragged by the feet..
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.FrictionMin
member.summary: Sets the FrictionMin setting for this Min Friction of an impact with a body part (not head, hands or feet) - to increase friction of slippy environment to get character to roll better. Applied in catchFall and rollUp(rollDownStairs).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.FrictionMax
member.summary: Sets the FrictionMax setting for this Max Friction of an impact with a body part (not head, hands or feet) - to increase friction of slippy environment to get character to roll better. Applied in catchFall and rollUp(rollDownStairs).
member.remarks: Default value = 9999.0f Min value = 0.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.StopOnSlopes
member.summary: Sets the StopOnSlopes setting for this Apply tactics to help stop on slopes..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.StopManual
member.summary: Sets the StopManual setting for this Override slope value to manually force stopping on flat ground. Encourages character to come to rest face down or face up..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.StoppedStrengthDecay
member.summary: Sets the StoppedStrengthDecay setting for this Speed at which strength reduces when stopped..
member.remarks: Default value = 5.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.SpineLean1Offset
member.summary: Sets the SpineLean1Offset setting for this Bias spine post towards hunched (away from arched)..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.RiflePose
member.summary: Sets the RiflePose setting for this Hold rifle in a safe position to reduce complications with collision. Only applied if holding a rifle.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.HkHeadAvoid
member.summary: Sets the HkHeadAvoid setting for this Enable head ground avoidance when handsAndKnees is true..
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.AntiPropClav
member.summary: Sets the AntiPropClav setting for this Discourage the character getting stuck propped up by elbows when falling backwards - by inhibiting backwards moving clavicles (keeps the arms slightly wider).
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.AntiPropWeak
member.summary: Sets the AntiPropWeak setting for this Discourage the character getting stuck propped up by elbows when falling backwards - by weakening the arms as soon they hit the floor. (Also stops the hands lifting up when flat on back).
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.HeadAsWeakAsArms
member.summary: Sets the HeadAsWeakAsArms setting for this Head weakens as arms weaken. If false and antiPropWeak when falls onto back doesn't loosen neck so early (matches bodyStrength instead).
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetFallingReactionHelper.SuccessStrength
member.summary: Sets the SuccessStrength setting for this When bodyStrength is less than successStrength send a success feedback - DO NOT GO OUTSIDE MIN/MAX PARAMETER VALUES OTHERWISE NO SUCCESS FEEDBACK WILL BE SENT.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.3f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterUnderwaterHelper

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterUnderwaterHelper.Underwater

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterUnderwaterHelper.Viscosity
member.summary: Sets the Viscosity setting for this viscosity applied to character's parts.

member.summary: Sets the GravityFactor setting for this gravity factor applied to character.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterUnderwaterHelper.Stroke
member.summary: Sets the Stroke setting for this swimming force applied to character as a function of handVelocity and footVelocity.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = -1000.0f Max value = 1000.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterUnderwaterHelper.LinearStroke
member.summary: Sets the LinearStroke setting for this swimming force (linearStroke=true,False) = (f(v),f(v*v)).
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.summary: Sets the Spin setting for this sliding friction turned into spin 80.0 (used in demo videos) good for rest of default params below. If 0.0 then no collision enhancement.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 100.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.MaxVelocity
member.summary: Sets the MaxVelocity setting for this torque = spin*(relative velocity) up to this maximum for relative velocity.
member.remarks: Default value = 8.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 100.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.ApplyToAll
member.summary: Sets the ApplyToAll setting for this
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.ApplyToSpine
member.summary: Sets the ApplyToSpine setting for this
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.ApplyToThighs
member.summary: Sets the ApplyToThighs setting for this
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.ApplyToClavicles
member.summary: Sets the ApplyToClavicles setting for this

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.ApplyToUpperArms
member.summary: Sets the ApplyToUpperArms setting for this

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.FootSlip
member.summary: Sets the FootSlip setting for this allow foot slipping if collided.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterCollisionsHelper.VehicleClass
member.summary: Sets the VehicleClass setting for this ClassType of the object against which to enhance the collision. All character vehicle interaction (e.g. braceForImpact glancing spins) relies on this value so EDIT WISELY. If it is used for things other than vehicles then NM should be informed..
member.remarks: Default value = 15 Min value = 0 Max value = 100

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper
member.summary: Damp out cartwheeling and somersaulting above a certain threshold

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the SetCharacterDampingHelper for sending a SetCharacterDamping to a given
member.param: The to send the SetCharacterDamping to.
member.remarks: Damp out cartwheeling and somersaulting above a certain threshold

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper.SomersaultThresh
member.summary: Sets the SomersaultThresh setting for this Somersault AngularMomentum measure above which we start damping - try 34.0. Falling over straight backwards gives 54 on hitting ground..
member.remarks: Default value = 34.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 200.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper.SomersaultDamp
member.summary: Sets the SomersaultDamp setting for this Amount to damp somersaulting by (spinning around left/right axis) - try 0.45.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper.CartwheelThresh
member.summary: Sets the CartwheelThresh setting for this Cartwheel AngularMomentum measure above which we start damping - try 27.0.
member.remarks: Default value = 27.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 200.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper.CartwheelDamp
member.summary: Sets the CartwheelDamp setting for this Amount to damp somersaulting by (spinning around front/back axis) - try 0.8.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper.VehicleCollisionTime
member.summary: Sets the VehicleCollisionTime setting for this Time after impact with a vehicle to apply characterDamping. -ve values mean always apply whether collided with vehicle or not. =0.0 never apply. =timestep apply for only that frame. A typical roll from being hit by a car lasts about 4secs..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 1000.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.SetCharacterDampingHelper.V2
member.summary: Sets the V2 setting for this If true damping is proportional to Angular momentum squared. If false proportional to Angular momentum.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.remarks: Default value = 11.0f Min value = 6.0f Max value = 16.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ArmsWindmillAdaptiveHelper.Amplitude
member.summary: Sets the Amplitude setting for this Controls how large the motion is, higher values means the character waves his arms in a massive arc.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ArmsWindmillAdaptiveHelper.Phase
member.summary: Sets the Phase setting for this Set to a non-zero value to desynchronise the left and right arms motion..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = -4.0f Max value = 8.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ArmsWindmillAdaptiveHelper.ArmStiffness
member.summary: Sets the ArmStiffness setting for this How stiff the arms are controls how pronounced the windmilling motion appears.
member.remarks: Default value = 14.1f Min value = 6.0f Max value = 16.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ArmsWindmillAdaptiveHelper.LeftElbowAngle
member.summary: Sets the LeftElbowAngle setting for this If not negative then left arm will blend to this angle.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 6.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ArmsWindmillAdaptiveHelper.RightElbowAngle
member.summary: Sets the RightElbowAngle setting for this If not negative then right arm will blend to this angle.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 6.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ArmsWindmillAdaptiveHelper.Lean1mult
member.summary: Sets the Lean1mult setting for this 0 arms go up and down at the side. 1 circles. 0..1 elipse.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ArmsWindmillAdaptiveHelper.Lean1offset
member.summary: Sets the Lean1offset setting for this 0.f centre of circle at side..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = -6.0f Max value = 6.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ArmsWindmillAdaptiveHelper.ElbowRate
member.summary: Sets the ElbowRate setting for this rate at which elbow tries to match *ElbowAngle.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 6.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ArmsWindmillAdaptiveHelper.ArmDirection
member.summary: Sets the ArmDirection setting for this
member.remarks: Default value =

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ArmsWindmillAdaptiveHelper.DisableOnImpact
member.summary: Sets the DisableOnImpact setting for this If true, each arm will stop windmilling if it hits the ground.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ArmsWindmillAdaptiveHelper.SetBackAngles
member.summary: Sets the SetBackAngles setting for this If true, back angles will be set to compliment arms windmill.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ArmsWindmillAdaptiveHelper.UseAngMom
member.summary: Sets the UseAngMom setting for this If true, use angular momentum about com to choose arm circling direction. Otherwise use com angular velocity.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ArmsWindmillAdaptiveHelper.BendLeftElbow
member.summary: Sets the BendLeftElbow setting for this If true, bend the left elbow to give a stuntman type scramble look.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ArmsWindmillAdaptiveHelper.BendRightElbow
member.summary: Sets the BendRightElbow setting for this If true, bend the right elbow to give a stuntman type scramble look.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ArmsWindmillAdaptiveHelper.Mask
member.summary: Sets the Mask setting for this Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see Active Pose notes for possible values).
member.remarks: Default value = ub

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper for sending a BalancerCollisionsReaction to a given
member.param: The to send the BalancerCollisionsReaction to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.NumStepsTillSlump
member.summary: Sets the NumStepsTillSlump setting for this Begin slump and stop stepping after this many steps.
member.remarks: Default value = 4 Min value = 0

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.Stable2SlumpTime
member.summary: Sets the Stable2SlumpTime setting for this Time after becoming stable leaning against a wall that slump starts.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ExclusionZone
member.summary: Sets the ExclusionZone setting for this Steps are ihibited to not go closer to the wall than this (after impact)..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f Min value = 0.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.FootFrictionMultStart
member.summary: Sets the FootFrictionMultStart setting for this Friction multiplier applied to feet when slump starts.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 4.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.FootFrictionMultRate
member.summary: Sets the FootFrictionMultRate setting for this Friction multiplier reduced by this amount every second after slump starts (only if character is not slumping).
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 50.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.BackFrictionMultStart
member.summary: Sets the BackFrictionMultStart setting for this Friction multiplier applied to back when slump starts.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 4.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.BackFrictionMultRate
member.summary: Sets the BackFrictionMultRate setting for this Friction multiplier reduced by this amount every second after slump starts (only if character is not slumping).
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 50.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ImpactLegStiffReduction
member.summary: Sets the ImpactLegStiffReduction setting for this Reduce the stiffness of the legs by this much as soon as an impact is detected.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 16.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SlumpLegStiffReduction
member.summary: Sets the SlumpLegStiffReduction setting for this Reduce the stiffness of the legs by this much as soon as slump starts.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 16.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SlumpLegStiffRate
member.summary: Sets the SlumpLegStiffRate setting for this Rate at which the stiffness of the legs is reduced during slump.
member.remarks: Default value = 8.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 50.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ReactTime
member.summary: Sets the ReactTime setting for this Time that the character reacts to the impact with ub flinch and writhe.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ImpactExagTime
member.summary: Sets the ImpactExagTime setting for this Time that the character exaggerates impact with spine.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.GlanceSpinTime
member.summary: Sets the GlanceSpinTime setting for this Duration that the glance torque is applied for.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.GlanceSpinMag
member.summary: Sets the GlanceSpinMag setting for this Magnitude of the glance torque.
member.remarks: Default value = 50.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1000.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.GlanceSpinDecayMult
member.summary: Sets the GlanceSpinDecayMult setting for this multiplier used when decaying torque spin over time.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.IgnoreColWithIndex
member.summary: Sets the IgnoreColWithIndex setting for this used so impact with the character that is pushing you over doesn't set off the behaviour.
member.remarks: Default value = -2 Min value = -2

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SlumpMode
member.summary: Sets the SlumpMode setting for this 0=Normal slump(less movement then slump and movement LT small), 1=fast slump, 2=less movement then slump.
member.remarks: Default value = 1 Min value = 0 Max value = 2

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ReboundMode
member.summary: Sets the ReboundMode setting for this 0=fall2knees/slump if shot not running, 1=stumble, 2=slump, 3=restart.
member.remarks: Default value = 0 Min value = 0 Max value = 3

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.IgnoreColMassBelow
member.summary: Sets the IgnoreColMassBelow setting for this collisions with non-fixed objects with mass below this will not set this behaviour off (e.g. ignore guns).
member.remarks: Default value = 20.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 1000.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ForwardMode
member.summary: Sets the ForwardMode setting for this 0=slump, 1=fallToKnees if shot is running, otherwise slump.
member.remarks: Default value = 0 Min value = 0 Max value = 1

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.TimeToForward
member.summary: Sets the TimeToForward setting for this time after a forwards impact before forwardMode is called (leave sometime for a rebound or brace - the min of 0.1 is to ensure fallOverWall can start although it probably needs only 1or2 frames for the probes to return).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f Min value = 0.1f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ReboundForce
member.summary: Sets the ReboundForce setting for this if forwards impact only: cheat force to try to get the character away from the wall. 3 is a good value..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.BraceWall
member.summary: Sets the BraceWall setting for this Brace against wall if forwards impact(at the moment only if bodyBalance is running/in charge of arms).
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.IgnoreColVolumeBelow
member.summary: Sets the IgnoreColVolumeBelow setting for this collisions with non-fixed objects with volume below this will not set this behaviour off.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 1000.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.FallOverWallDrape
member.summary: Sets the FallOverWallDrape setting for this use fallOverWall as the main drape reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.FallOverHighWalls
member.summary: Sets the FallOverHighWalls setting for this trigger fall over wall if hit up to spine2 else only if hit up to spine1.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.Snap
member.summary: Sets the Snap setting for this Add a Snap to when you hit a wall to emphasize the hit..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapMag
member.summary: Sets the SnapMag setting for this The magnitude of the snap reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = -0.6f Min value = -10.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapDirectionRandomness
member.summary: Sets the SnapDirectionRandomness setting for this The character snaps in a prescribed way (decided by bullet direction) - Higher the value the more random this direction is..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapLeftArm
member.summary: Sets the SnapLeftArm setting for this snap the leftArm..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapRightArm
member.summary: Sets the SnapRightArm setting for this snap the rightArm..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.summary: Sets the SnapLeftLeg setting for this snap the leftLeg..

member.summary: Sets the SnapRightLeg setting for this snap the rightLeg..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapSpine
member.summary: Sets the SnapSpine setting for this snap the spine..
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapNeck
member.summary: Sets the SnapNeck setting for this snap the neck..
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.summary: Sets the SnapPhasedLegs setting for this Legs are either in phase with each other or not.

member.summary: Sets the SnapHipType setting for this type of hip reaction 0=none, 1=side2side 2=steplike.
member.remarks: Default value = 0 Min value = 0 Max value = 2

member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 100.0f

member.summary: Sets the UnSnapRatio setting for this The magnitude of the reverse snap.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 100.0f

member.summary: Sets the SnapUseTorques setting for this use torques to make the snap otherwise use a change in the parts angular velocity.

member.summary: Sets the SomersaultAngle setting for this multiplier of the somersault 'angle' (lean forward/back) for arms out (lean2).

member.summary: Sets the SomersaultAngleThreshold setting for this Amount of somersault 'angle' before m_somersaultAngle is used for ArmsOut. Unless drunk - DO NOT EXCEED 0.8.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.SideSomersaultAngle
member.summary: Sets the SideSomersaultAngle setting for this Amount of side somersault 'angle' before sideSomersault is used for ArmsOut. Unless drunk - DO NOT EXCEED 0.8.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.SideSomersaultAngleThreshold
member.summary: Sets the SideSomersaultAngleThreshold setting for this
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.BackwardsAutoTurn
member.summary: Sets the BackwardsAutoTurn setting for this Automatically turn around if moving backwards.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.TurnWithBumpRadius
member.summary: Sets the TurnWithBumpRadius setting for this 0.9 is a sensible value. If pusher within this distance then turn to get out of the way of the pusher.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.BackwardsArms
member.summary: Sets the BackwardsArms setting for this Bend elbows, relax shoulders and inhibit spine twist when moving backwards.

member.summary: Sets the BlendToZeroPose setting for this Blend upper body to zero pose as the character comes to rest. If false blend to a stored pose.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ArmsOutOnPush
member.summary: Sets the ArmsOutOnPush setting for this Put arms out based on lean2 of legs, or angular velocity (lean or twist), or lean (front/back or side/side).

member.summary: Sets the ArmsOutOnPushMultiplier setting for this Arms out based on lean2 of the legs to simulate being pushed.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.SpineDamping
member.summary: Sets the SpineDamping setting for this
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.UseBodyTurn
member.summary: Sets the UseBodyTurn setting for this
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.UseArmToSlowDown
member.summary: Sets the UseArmToSlowDown setting for this the degree to which the character will try to stop a barrel roll with his arms.

member.summary: Sets the ArmReachAmount setting for this the likeliness of the character reaching for the ground with its arms.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.4f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 3.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.Mask
member.summary: Sets the Mask setting for this Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see Active Pose notes for possible values).
member.remarks: Default value = fb

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.LegPush
member.summary: Sets the LegPush setting for this used to keep rolling down slope, 1 is full (kicks legs out when pointing upwards).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.AsymmetricalLegs
member.summary: Sets the AsymmetricalLegs setting for this 0 is no leg asymmetry in 'foetal' position. greater than 0 a asymmetricalLegs-rand(30%), added/minus each joint of the legs in radians. Random number changes about once every roll. 0.4 gives a lot of asymmetry.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = -2.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.NoRollTimeBeforeSuccess
member.summary: Sets the NoRollTimeBeforeSuccess setting for this time that roll velocity has to be lower than rollVelForSuccess, before success message is sent.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.RollVelForSuccess
member.summary: Sets the RollVelForSuccess setting for this lower threshold for roll velocity at which success message can be sent.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.RollVelLinearContribution
member.summary: Sets the RollVelLinearContribution setting for this contribution of linear COM velocity to roll Velocity (if 0, roll velocity equal to COM angular velocity).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.VelocityScale
member.summary: Sets the VelocityScale setting for this Scales perceived body velocity. The higher this value gets, the more quickly the velocity measure saturates, resulting in a tighter roll at slower speeds. (NB: Set to 1 to match earlier behaviour).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.VelocityOffset
member.summary: Sets the VelocityOffset setting for this Offsets perceived body velocity. Increase to create larger "dead zone" around zero velocity where character will be less rolled. (NB: Reset to 0 to match earlier behaviour).
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.ApplyMinMaxFriction
member.summary: Sets the ApplyMinMaxFriction setting for this Controls whether or not behaviour enforces min/max friction.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.summary: Sets the ShoulderLean1 setting for this Blend writhe shoulder desired lean1 with this angle in RAD. Note that onFire has to be set to true for this parameter to take any effect..

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.ShoulderLean2
