member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 6.3f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.Lean1BlendFactor
member.summary: Sets the Lean1BlendFactor setting for this Shoulder desired lean1 with shoulderLean1 angle blend factor. Set it to 0 to use original shoulder withe desired lean1 angle for shoulders. Note that onFire has to be set to true for this parameter to take any effect..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.Lean2BlendFactor
member.summary: Sets the Lean2BlendFactor setting for this Shoulder desired lean2 with shoulderLean2 angle blend factor. Set it to 0 to use original shoulder withe desired lean2 angle for shoulders. Note that onFire has to be set to true for this parameter to take any effect..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.RollTorqueScale
member.summary: Sets the RollTorqueScale setting for this Scale rolling torque that is applied to character spine..
member.remarks: Default value = 150.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 300.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.MaxRollOverTime
member.summary: Sets the MaxRollOverTime setting for this Rolling torque is ramped down over time. At this time in seconds torque value converges to zero. Use this parameter to restrict time the character is rolling. Note that onFire has to be set to true for this parameter to take any effect..
member.remarks: Default value = 8.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 60.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.RollOverRadius
member.summary: Sets the RollOverRadius setting for this Rolling torque is ramped down with distance measured from position where character hit the ground and started rolling. At this distance in meters torque value converges to zero. Use this parameter to restrict distance the character travels due to rolling. Note that onFire has to be set to true for this parameter to take any effect..
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.BbArms
member.summary: Sets the BbArms setting for this Use bodyBalance arms for the default (non bracing) behaviour if bodyBalance is active.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.NewBrace
member.summary: Sets the NewBrace setting for this Use the new brace prediction code.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.BraceOnImpact
member.summary: Sets the BraceOnImpact setting for this If true then if a shin or thigh is in contact with the car then brace. NB: newBrace must be true. For those situations where the car has pushed the ped backwards (at the same speed as the car) before the behaviour has been started and so doesn't predict an impact..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.Roll2Velocity
member.summary: Sets the Roll2Velocity setting for this When rollDownStairs is running use roll2Velocity to control the helper torques (this only attempts to roll to the chaarcter's velocity not some default linear velocity mag.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.RollType
member.summary: Sets the RollType setting for this 0 = original/roll off/stay on car: Roll with character velocity, 1 = //Gentle: roll off/stay on car = use relative velocity of character to car to roll against, 2 = //roll over car: Roll against character velocity. i.e. roll against any velocity picked up by hitting car, 3 = //Gentle: roll over car: use relative velocity of character to car to roll with.
member.remarks: Default value = 3 Min value = 0 Max value = 3

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.SnapImpacts
member.summary: Sets the SnapImpacts setting for this Exaggerate impacts using snap.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.SnapImpact
member.summary: Sets the SnapImpact setting for this Exaggeration amount of the initial impact (legs). +ve fold with car impact (as if pushed at hips in the car velocity direction). -ve fold away from car impact.
member.remarks: Default value = 7.0f Min value = -20.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.SnapBonnet
member.summary: Sets the SnapBonnet setting for this Exaggeration amount of the secondary (torso) impact with bonnet. +ve fold with car impact (as if pushed at hips by the impact normal). -ve fold away from car impact.
member.remarks: Default value = -7.0f Min value = -20.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.SnapFloor
member.summary: Sets the SnapFloor setting for this Exaggeration amount of the impact with the floor after falling off of car +ve fold with floor impact (as if pushed at hips in the impact normal direction). -ve fold away from car impact.
member.remarks: Default value = 7.0f Min value = -20.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.DampVel
member.summary: Sets the DampVel setting for this Damp out excessive spin and upward velocity when on car.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.DampSpin
member.summary: Sets the DampSpin setting for this Amount to damp spinning by (cartwheeling and somersaulting).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 40.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.DampUpVel
member.summary: Sets the DampUpVel setting for this Amount to damp upward velocity by to limit the amount of air above the car the character can get..
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 40.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.DampSpinThresh
member.summary: Sets the DampSpinThresh setting for this Angular velocity above which we start damping.
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.DampUpVelThresh
member.summary: Sets the DampUpVelThresh setting for this Upward velocity above which we start damping.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsHelp
member.summary: Sets the GsHelp setting for this Enhance a glancing spin with the side of the car by modulating body friction..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsEndMin
member.summary: Sets the GsEndMin setting for this ID for glancing spin. min depth to be considered from either end (front/rear) of a car (-ve is inside the car area).
member.remarks: Default value = -0.1f Min value = -10.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsSideMin
member.summary: Sets the GsSideMin setting for this ID for glancing spin. min depth to be considered on the side of a car (-ve is inside the car area).
member.remarks: Default value = -0.2f Min value = -10.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsSideMax
member.summary: Sets the GsSideMax setting for this ID for glancing spin. max depth to be considered on the side of a car (+ve is outside the car area).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f Min value = -10.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsUpness
member.summary: Sets the GsUpness setting for this ID for glancing spin. Character has to be more upright than this value for it to be considered on the side of a car. Fully upright = 1, upsideDown = -1. Max Angle from upright is acos(gsUpness).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.9f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsCarVelMin
member.summary: Sets the GsCarVelMin setting for this ID for glancing spin. Minimum car velocity..
member.remarks: Default value = 3.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsScale1Foot
member.summary: Sets the GsScale1Foot setting for this Apply gsFricScale1 to the foot if colliding with car. (Otherwise foot friction - with the ground - is determined by gsFricScale2 if it is in gsFricMask2).
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsFricScale1
member.summary: Sets the GsFricScale1 setting for this Glancing spin help. Friction scale applied when to the side of the car. e.g. make the character spin more by upping the friction against the car.
member.remarks: Default value = 8.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsFricMask1
member.summary: Sets the GsFricMask1 setting for this Glancing spin help. Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see notes for explanation). Note gsFricMask1 and gsFricMask2 are made independent by the code so you can have fb for gsFricMask1 but gsFricScale1 will not be applied to any bodyParts in gsFricMask2.
member.remarks: Default value = fb

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsFricScale2
member.summary: Sets the GsFricScale2 setting for this Glancing spin help. Friction scale applied when to the side of the car. e.g. make the character spin more by lowering the feet friction. You could also lower the wrist friction here to stop the car pulling along the hands i.e. gsFricMask2 = la|uw.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsFricMask2
member.summary: Sets the GsFricMask2 setting for this Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see notes for explanation). Note gsFricMask1 and gsFricMask2 are made independent by the code so you can have fb for gsFricMask1 but gsFricScale1 will not be applied to any bodyParts in gsFricMask2.
member.remarks: Default value = la

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.CatchFallHelper.ZAxisSpinReduction

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.CatchFallHelper.ExtraSit

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ElectrocuteHelper for sending a Electrocute to a given

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.StunMag
member.summary: Sets the StunMag setting for this The magnitude of the reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.InitialMult
member.summary: Sets the InitialMult setting for this initialMult*stunMag = The magnitude of the 1st snap reaction (other mults are applied after this).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.LargeMult
member.summary: Sets the LargeMult setting for this largeMult*stunMag = The magnitude of a random large snap reaction (other mults are applied after this).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.LargeMinTime
member.summary: Sets the LargeMinTime setting for this min time to next large random snap (about 14 snaps with stunInterval = 0.07s).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 200.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.LargeMaxTime
member.summary: Sets the LargeMaxTime setting for this max time to next large random snap (about 28 snaps with stunInterval = 0.07s).
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 200.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.MovingMult
member.summary: Sets the MovingMult setting for this movingMult*stunMag = The magnitude of the reaction if moving(comVelMag) faster than movingThresh.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.BalancingMult
member.summary: Sets the BalancingMult setting for this balancingMult*stunMag = The magnitude of the reaction if balancing = (not lying on the floor/ not upper body not collided) and not airborne.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.AirborneMult
member.summary: Sets the AirborneMult setting for this airborneMult*stunMag = The magnitude of the reaction if airborne.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.MovingThresh
member.summary: Sets the MovingThresh setting for this If moving(comVelMag) faster than movingThresh then mvingMult applied to stunMag.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.StunInterval
member.summary: Sets the StunInterval setting for this Direction flips every stunInterval.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.DirectionRandomness
member.summary: Sets the DirectionRandomness setting for this The character vibrates in a prescribed way - Higher the value the more random this direction is..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.summary: Sets the MagOfForce setting for this Magnitude of the falloverWall helper force.

member.summary: Sets the MinLegHeight setting for this minimum height of pelvis above feet at which fallOverWall is attempted.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f Min value = 0.1f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.BodyTwist
member.summary: Sets the BodyTwist setting for this amount of twist to apply to the spine as the character tries to fling himself over the wall, provides more of a believable roll but increases the amount of lateral space the character needs to successfully flip..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MaxTwist
member.summary: Sets the MaxTwist setting for this max angle the character can twist before twsit helper torques are turned off.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.1f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.FallOverWallEndA
member.summary: Sets the FallOverWallEndA setting for this One end of the wall to try to fall over..
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f)

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.FallOverWallEndB
member.summary: Sets the FallOverWallEndB setting for this One end of the wall over which we are trying to fall over..
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f)

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.ForceAngleAbort
member.summary: Sets the ForceAngleAbort setting for this The angle abort threshold..
member.remarks: Default value = -0.2f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.ForceTimeOut
member.summary: Sets the ForceTimeOut setting for this The force time out..
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MoveArms
member.summary: Sets the MoveArms setting for this Lift the arms up if true. Do nothing with the arms if false (eg when using catchfall arms or brace etc).
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MoveLegs
member.summary: Sets the MoveLegs setting for this Move the legs if true. Do nothing with the legs if false (eg when using dynamicBalancer etc).
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.BendSpine
member.summary: Sets the BendSpine setting for this Bend spine to help falloverwall if true. Do nothing with the spine if false..
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.AngleDirWithWallNormal
member.summary: Sets the AngleDirWithWallNormal setting for this Maximum angle in degrees (between the direction of the velocity of the COM and the wall normal) to start to apply forces and torques to fall over the wall..
member.remarks: Default value = 180.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 180.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.LeaningAngleThreshold
member.summary: Sets the LeaningAngleThreshold setting for this Maximum angle in degrees (between the vertical vector and a vector from pelvis to lower neck) to start to apply forces and torques to fall over the wall..
member.remarks: Default value = 180.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 180.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MaxAngVel
member.summary: Sets the MaxAngVel setting for this if the angular velocity is higher than maxAngVel, the torques and forces are not applied..
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 30.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.AdaptForcesToLowWall
member.summary: Sets the AdaptForcesToLowWall setting for this Will reduce the magnitude of the forces applied to the character to help him to fall over wall.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MaxWallHeight
member.summary: Sets the MaxWallHeight setting for this Maximum height (from the lowest foot) to start to apply forces and torques to fall over the wall..
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 3.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.DistanceToSendSuccessMessage
member.summary: Sets the DistanceToSendSuccessMessage setting for this Minimum distance between the pelvis and the wall to send the success message. If negative doesn't take this parameter into account when sending feedback..
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 3.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.RollingBackThr
member.summary: Sets the RollingBackThr setting for this Value of the angular velocity about the wallEgde above which the character is considered as rolling backwards i.e. goes in to fow_RollingBack state.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.RollingPotential
member.summary: Sets the RollingPotential setting for this On impact with the wall if the rollingPotential(calculated from the characters linear velocity w.r.t the wall) is greater than this value the character will try to go over the wall otherwise it won't try (fow_Aborted)..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.UseArmIK
member.summary: Sets the UseArmIK setting for this Try to reach the wallEdge. To configure the IK : use limitAngleBack, limitAngleFront and limitAngleTotallyBack..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.ReachDistanceFromHitPoint
member.summary: Sets the ReachDistanceFromHitPoint setting for this distance from predicted hitpoint where each hands will try to reach the wall..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MinReachDistanceFromHitPoint
member.summary: Sets the MinReachDistanceFromHitPoint setting for this minimal distance from predicted hitpoint where each hands will try to reach the wall. Used if the hand target is outside the wall Edge..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.AngleTotallyBack
member.summary: Sets the AngleTotallyBack setting for this max angle in degrees (between 1.the vector between two hips and 2. wallEdge) to try to reach the wall just behind his pelvis with his arms when the character is back to the wall..
member.remarks: Default value = 15.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 180.0f

member.summary: Sets the UseLineGrab setting for this use the line grab, Grab along the line (x-x2).

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.DontLetGo
member.summary: Sets the DontLetGo setting for this Once a constraint is made, keep reaching with whatever hand is allowed - no matter what the angle/distance and whether or not the constraint has broken due to constraintForce GT grabStrength. mmmtodo this is a badly named parameter.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.BodyStiffness
member.summary: Sets the BodyStiffness setting for this stiffness of upper body. Scales the arm grab such that the armStiffness is default when this is at default value.
member.remarks: Default value = 11.0f Min value = 6.0f Max value = 16.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.ReachAngle
member.summary: Sets the ReachAngle setting for this Angle from front at which the grab activates. If the point is outside this angle from front will not try to grab..
member.remarks: Default value = 2.8f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 3.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.OneSideReachAngle
member.summary: Sets the OneSideReachAngle setting for this Angle at which we will only reach with one hand..

member.summary: Sets the GrabDistance setting for this Relative distance at which the grab starts..
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 4.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.Move2Radius
member.summary: Sets the Move2Radius setting for this Relative distance (additional to grabDistance - doesn't try to move inside grabDistance)at which the grab tries to use the balancer to move to the grab point..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 14.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.ArmStiffness
member.summary: Sets the ArmStiffness setting for this Stiffness of the arm..
member.remarks: Default value = 14.0f Min value = 6.0f Max value = 16.0f

member.summary: Sets the MaxReachDistance setting for this distance to reach out towards the grab point..

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.BodyStiffness

member.remarks: Default value = 11.0f Min value = 6.0f Max value = 16.0f

member.summary: Sets the Bodydamping setting for this The damping of the joints..

member.summary: Sets the Catchfalltime setting for this The length of time before the impact that the character transitions to the landing..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.CrashOrLandCutOff
member.summary: Sets the CrashOrLandCutOff setting for this 0.52angle is 0.868 dot//A threshold for deciding how far away from upright the character needs to be before bailing out (going into a foetal) instead of trying to land (keeping stretched out). NB: never does bailout if ignorWorldCollisions true.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.9f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.PdStrength
member.summary: Sets the PdStrength setting for this Strength of the controller to keep the character at angle aimAngleBase from vertical..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.PdDamping
member.summary: Sets the PdDamping setting for this Damping multiplier of the controller to keep the character at angle aimAngleBase from vertical. The actual damping is pdDamping*pdStrength*constant*angVel..
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 5.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.ArmAngSpeed
member.summary: Sets the ArmAngSpeed setting for this arm circling speed in armWindMillAdaptive.
member.remarks: Default value = 7.9f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.ArmAmplitude
member.summary: Sets the ArmAmplitude setting for this in armWindMillAdaptive.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.ArmPhase
member.summary: Sets the ArmPhase setting for this in armWindMillAdaptive 3.1 opposite for stuntman. 1.0 old default. 0.0 in phase..
member.remarks: Default value = 3.1f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 6.3f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.ArmBendElbows
member.summary: Sets the ArmBendElbows setting for this in armWindMillAdaptive bend the elbows as a function of armAngle. For stuntman true otherwise false..
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.LegRadius
member.summary: Sets the LegRadius setting for this radius of legs on pedal.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 0.5f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.LegAngSpeed
member.summary: Sets the LegAngSpeed setting for this in pedal.
member.remarks: Default value = 7.9f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 15.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.LegAsymmetry
member.summary: Sets the LegAsymmetry setting for this 0.0 for stuntman. Random offset applied per leg to the angular speed to desynchronise the pedaling - set to 0 to disable, otherwise should be set to less than the angularSpeed value..
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f Min value = -10.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.Arms2LegsPhase
member.summary: Sets the Arms2LegsPhase setting for this phase angle between the arms and legs circling angle.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 6.5f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.Arms2LegsSync
member.summary: Sets the Arms2LegsSync setting for this Syncs the arms angle to what the leg angle is.
member.remarks: Default value = All speed/direction parameters of armswindmill are overwritten if = If and you want synced arms/legs then armAngSpeed=legAngSpeed, legAsymmetry = 0.0 (to stop randomizations of the leg cicle speed)

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.ArmsUp
member.summary: Sets the ArmsUp setting for this Where to put the arms when preparing to land. Approx 1 = above head, 0 = head height, -1 = down. LT -2.0 use catchFall arms, LT -3.0 use prepare for landing pose if Agent is due to land vertically, feet first..
member.remarks: Default value = -3.1f Min value = -4.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.OrientateBodyToFallDirection
member.summary: Sets the OrientateBodyToFallDirection setting for this toggle to orientate to fall direction. i.e. orientate so that the character faces the horizontal velocity direction.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.OrientateTwist
member.summary: Sets the OrientateTwist setting for this If false don't worry about the twist angle of the character when orientating the character. If false this allows the twist axis of the character to be free (You can get a nice twisting highFall like the one in dieHard 4 when the car goes into the helicopter).
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.OrientateMax
member.summary: Sets the OrientateMax setting for this DEVEL parameter - suggest you don't edit it. Maximum torque the orientation controller can apply. If 0 then no helper torques will be used. 300 will orientate the character soflty for all but extreme angles away from aimAngleBase. If abs (current -aimAngleBase) is getting near 3.0 then this can be reduced to give a softer feel..
member.remarks: Default value = 300.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2000.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.AlanRickman
member.summary: Sets the AlanRickman setting for this If true then orientate the character to face the point from where it started falling. HighFall like the one in dieHard with Alan Rickman.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.FowardRoll
member.summary: Sets the FowardRoll setting for this Try to execute a forward Roll on landing.

member.summary: Sets the UseZeroPose_withFowardRoll setting for this Blend to a zero pose when forward roll is attempted..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f Min value = -3.1f Max value = 3.1f

member.summary: Sets the LegStrength setting for this Strength of the legs at landing.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.RollTorqueScale
member.summary: Sets the RollTorqueScale setting for this Scale rolling torque that is applied to character spine by bodyWrithe. Torque magnitude is calculated with the following formula: m_rollOverDirection*rollOverPhase*rollTorqueScale..
member.remarks: Default value = 25.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 300.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.PredictTime
member.summary: Sets the PredictTime setting for this Character pose depends on character facing direction that is evaluated from its COMTM orientation. Set this value to 0 to use no orientation prediction i.e. current character COMTM orientation will be used to determine character facing direction and finally the pose bodyWrithe is blending to. Set this value to GT 0 to predict character COMTM orientation this amout of time in seconds to the future..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.MaxRollOverTime
member.summary: Sets the MaxRollOverTime setting for this Rolling torque is ramped down over time. At this time in seconds torque value converges to zero. Use this parameter to restrict time the character is rolling..
member.remarks: Default value = 8.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 60.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.RollOverRadius
member.summary: Sets the RollOverRadius setting for this Rolling torque is ramped down with distance measured from position where character hit the ground and started rolling. At this distance in meters torque value converges to zero. Use this parameter to restrict distance the character travels due to rolling..
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the PedalLegsHelper for sending a PedalLegs to a given
member.param: The to send the PedalLegs to.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.PedalLeftLeg
member.summary: Sets the PedalLeftLeg setting for this pedal with this leg or not.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.PedalRightLeg
member.summary: Sets the PedalRightLeg setting for this pedal with this leg or not.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.BackPedal
member.summary: Sets the BackPedal setting for this pedal forwards or backwards.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.Radius
member.summary: Sets the Radius setting for this base radius of pedal action.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.AngularSpeed
member.summary: Sets the AngularSpeed setting for this rate of pedaling. If adaptivePedal4Dragging is true then the legsAngularSpeed calculated to match the linear speed of the character can have a maximum value of angularSpeed (this max used to be hard coded to 13.0).
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 100.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.LegStiffness
member.summary: Sets the LegStiffness setting for this stiffness of legs.
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f Min value = 6.0f Max value = 16.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.PedalOffset
member.summary: Sets the PedalOffset setting for this Move the centre of the pedal for the left leg up by this amount, the right leg down by this amount.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.RandomSeed
member.summary: Sets the RandomSeed setting for this Random seed used to generate speed changes.
member.remarks: Default value = 100 Min value = 0

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.SpeedAsymmetry
member.summary: Sets the SpeedAsymmetry setting for this Random offset applied per leg to the angular speed to desynchronise the pedaling - set to 0 to disable, otherwise should be set to less than the angularSpeed value..
member.remarks: Default value = 8.0f Min value = -10.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.AdaptivePedal4Dragging
member.summary: Sets the AdaptivePedal4Dragging setting for this Will pedal in the direction of travel (if backPedal = false, against travel if backPedal = true) and with an angular velocity relative to speed upto a maximum of 13(rads/sec). Use when being dragged by a car. Overrides angularSpeed..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.AngSpeedMultiplier4Dragging
member.summary: Sets the AngSpeedMultiplier4Dragging setting for this newAngularSpeed = Clamp(angSpeedMultiplier4Dragging * linear_speed/pedalRadius, 0.0, angularSpeed).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 100.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.RadiusVariance
member.summary: Sets the RadiusVariance setting for this 0-1 value used to add variance to the radius value while pedalling, to desynchonize the legs' movement and provide some variety.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.LegAngleVariance
member.summary: Sets the LegAngleVariance setting for this 0-1 value used to vary the angle of the legs from the hips during the pedal.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.CentreSideways
member.summary: Sets the CentreSideways setting for this Move the centre of the pedal for both legs sideways (+ve = right). NB: not applied to hula..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.CentreForwards
member.summary: Sets the CentreForwards setting for this Move the centre of the pedal for both legs forward (or backward -ve).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.CentreUp
member.summary: Sets the CentreUp setting for this Move the centre of the pedal for both legs up (or down -ve).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.Ellipse
member.summary: Sets the Ellipse setting for this Turn the circle into an ellipse. Ellipse has horizontal radius a and vertical radius b. If ellipse is +ve then a=radius*ellipse and b=radius. If ellipse is -ve then a=radius and b = radius*ellipse. 0.0 = vertical line of length 2*radius, 0.0:1.0 circle squashed horizontally (vertical radius = radius), 1.0=circle. -0.001 = horizontal line of length 2*radius, -0.0:-1.0 circle squashed vertically (horizontal radius = radius), -1.0 = circle.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.DragReduction
member.summary: Sets the DragReduction setting for this how much to account for the target moving through space rather than being static.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.Spread
member.summary: Sets the Spread setting for this Spread legs..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.Hula
member.summary: Sets the Hula setting for this If true circle the legs in a hula motion..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.summary: Sets the ArmStiffness setting for this Stiffness of the arm..

member.summary: Sets the ArmStiffnessDetSupport setting for this Stiffness of the arm on pointing arm when a support arm is detached from a two-handed weapon..

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ArmDamping
member.summary: Sets the ArmDamping setting for this Damping..
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.1f Max value = 5.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.GravityOpposition
member.summary: Sets the GravityOpposition setting for this Amount of gravity opposition on pointing arm..
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.summary: Sets the GravOppDetachedSupport setting for this Amount of gravity opposition on pointing arm when a support arm is detached from a two-handed weapon..

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.MassMultDetachedSupport
member.summary: Sets the MassMultDetachedSupport setting for this Amount of mass of weapon taken into account by gravity opposition on pointing arm when a support arm is detached from a two-handed weapon. The lower the value the more the character doesn't know about the weapon mass and therefore is more affected by it..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.AllowShotLooseness
member.summary: Sets the AllowShotLooseness setting for this Allow shot to set a lower arm muscleStiffness than pointGun normally would..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ClavicleBlend
member.summary: Sets the ClavicleBlend setting for this How much of blend should come from incoming transforms 0(all IK) .. 1(all ITMs) For pointing arms only. (Support arm uses the IK solution as is for clavicles).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ElbowAttitude
member.summary: Sets the ElbowAttitude setting for this Controls arm twist. (except in pistolIK).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.SupportConstraint
member.summary: Sets the SupportConstraint setting for this Type of constraint between the support hand and gun. 0=no constraint, 1=hard distance constraint, 2=Force based constraint, 3=hard spherical constraint.
member.remarks: Default value = 1 Min value = 0 Max value = 3

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ConstraintMinDistance
member.summary: Sets the ConstraintMinDistance setting for this For supportConstraint = 1: Support hand constraint distance will be slowly reduced until it hits this value. This is for stability and also allows the pointing arm to lead a little. Don't set lower than NM_MIN_STABLE_DISTANCECONSTRAINT_DISTANCE 0.001f.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 0.1f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.MakeConstraintDistance
member.summary: Sets the MakeConstraintDistance setting for this For supportConstraint = 1: Minimum distance within which support hand constraint will be made..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 3.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ReduceConstraintLengthVel
member.summary: Sets the ReduceConstraintLengthVel setting for this For supportConstraint = 1: Velocity at which to reduce the support hand constraint length.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.5f Min value = 0.1f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.BreakingStrength
member.summary: Sets the BreakingStrength setting for this For supportConstraint = 1: strength of the supporting hands constraint (kg m/s), -1 to ignore/disable.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 1000.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.BrokenSupportTime
member.summary: Sets the BrokenSupportTime setting for this Once constraint is broken then do not try to reconnect/support for this amount of time.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 5.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.BrokenToSideProb
member.summary: Sets the BrokenToSideProb setting for this Probability that the when a constraint is broken that during brokenSupportTime a side pose will be selected..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ConnectAfter
member.summary: Sets the ConnectAfter setting for this If gunArm has been controlled by other behaviours for this time when it could have been pointing but couldn't due to pointing only allowed if connected, change gunArm pose to something that could connect for connectFor seconds.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 5.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ConnectFor
member.summary: Sets the ConnectFor setting for this Time to try to reconnect for.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 5.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.OneHandedPointing
member.summary: Sets the OneHandedPointing setting for this 0 = don't allow, 1= allow for kPistol(two handed pistol) only, 2 = allow for kRifle only, 3 = allow for kPistol and kRifle. Allow one handed pointing - no constraint if cant be supported . If not allowed then gunHand does not try to point at target if it cannot be supported - the constraint will be controlled by always support..
member.remarks: Default value = 1 Min value = 0 Max value = 3

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.AlwaysSupport
member.summary: Sets the AlwaysSupport setting for this Support a non pointing gunHand i.e. if in zero pose (constrain as well if constraint possible).
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.PoseUnusedGunArm
member.summary: Sets the PoseUnusedGunArm setting for this Apply neutral pose when a gun arm isn't in use. NB: at the moment Rifle hand is always controlled by pointGun..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.PoseUnusedSupportArm
member.summary: Sets the PoseUnusedSupportArm setting for this Apply neutral pose when a support arm isn't in use..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.PoseUnusedOtherArm
member.summary: Sets the PoseUnusedOtherArm setting for this Apply neutral pose to the non-gun arm (otherwise it is always under the control of other behaviours or not set). If the non-gun hand is a supporting hand it is not controlled by this parameter but by poseUnusedSupportArm.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.MaxAngleAcross
member.summary: Sets the MaxAngleAcross setting for this max aiming angle(deg) sideways across body midline measured from chest forward that the character will try to point.
member.remarks: Default value = 90.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 180.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.MaxAngleAway
member.summary: Sets the MaxAngleAway setting for this max aiming angle(deg) sideways away from body midline measured from chest forward that the character will try to point.
member.remarks: Default value = 90.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 180.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.FallingLimits
member.summary: Sets the FallingLimits setting for this 0= don't apply limits. 1=apply the limits below only when the character is falling. 2 = always apply these limits (instead of applying maxAngleAcross and maxAngleAway which only limits the horizontal angle but implicity limits the updown (the limit shape is a vertical hinge).
member.remarks: Default value = 0 Min value = 0 Max value = 2

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.AcrossLimit
member.summary: Sets the AcrossLimit setting for this max aiming angle(deg) sideways across body midline measured from chest forward that the character will try to point. i.e. for rightHanded gun this is the angle left of the midline.
member.remarks: Default value = 90.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 180.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.AwayLimit
member.summary: Sets the AwayLimit setting for this max aiming angle(deg) sideways away from body midline measured from chest forward that the character will try to point. i.e. for rightHanded gun this is the angle right of the midline.
member.remarks: Default value = 90.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 180.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.UpLimit
member.summary: Sets the UpLimit setting for this max aiming angle(deg) upwards from body midline measured from chest forward that the character will try to point..
member.remarks: Default value = 90.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 180.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.DownLimit
member.summary: Sets the DownLimit setting for this max aiming angle(deg) downwards from body midline measured from chest forward that the character will try to point.
member.remarks: Default value = 45.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 180.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.RifleFall
member.summary: Sets the RifleFall setting for this Pose the rifle hand to reduce complications with collisions. 0 = false, 1 = always when falling, 2 = when falling except if falling backwards.
member.remarks: Default value = 0 Min value = 0 Max value = 2

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.FallingSupport
member.summary: Sets the FallingSupport setting for this Allow supporting of a rifle(or two handed pistol) when falling. 0 = false, 1 = support if allowed, 2 = support until constraint not active (don't allow support to restart), 3 = support until constraint not effective (support hand to support distance must be less than 0.15 - don't allow support to restart)..
member.remarks: Default value = 1 Min value = 0 Max value = 3

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.FallingTypeSupport
member.summary: Sets the FallingTypeSupport setting for this What is considered a fall by fallingSupport). Apply fallingSupport 0=never(will support if allowed), 1 = falling, 2 = falling except if falling backwards, 3 = falling and collided, 4 = falling and collided except if falling backwards, 5 = falling except if falling backwards until collided.
member.remarks: Default value = 0 Min value = 0 Max value = 5

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.PistolNeutralType
member.summary: Sets the PistolNeutralType setting for this 0 = byFace, 1=acrossFront, 2=bySide. NB: bySide is not connectible so be careful if combined with kPistol and oneHandedPointing = 0 or 2.
member.remarks: Default value = 0 Min value = 0 Max value = 2

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.NeutralPoint4Pistols

member.summary: Sets the FireWeaponRelaxTime setting for this Duration of arms relax following firing weapon. NB:This is clamped (0,5) in pointGun.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.FireWeaponRelaxAmount
member.summary: Sets the FireWeaponRelaxAmount setting for this Relax multiplier following firing weapon. Recovers over relaxTime..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f Min value = 0.1f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.FireWeaponRelaxDistance
member.summary: Sets the FireWeaponRelaxDistance setting for this Range of motion for ik-based recoil..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 0.3f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.UseIncomingTransforms
member.summary: Sets the UseIncomingTransforms setting for this Use the incoming transforms to inform the pointGun of the primaryWeaponDistance, poleVector for the arm.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.MeasureParentOffset
member.summary: Sets the MeasureParentOffset setting for this If useIncomingTransforms = true and measureParentOffset=true then measure the Pointing-from offset from parent effector, using itms - this should point the barrel of the gun to the target. This is added to the rightHandParentOffset. NB NOT used if rightHandParentEffector LT 0.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.LeftHandParentOffset
member.summary: Sets the LeftHandParentOffset setting for this Pointing-from offset from parent effector, expressed in spine3's frame, x = back/forward, y = right/left, z = up/down..
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f)

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.LeftHandParentEffector
member.summary: Sets the LeftHandParentEffector setting for this 1 = Use leftShoulder. Effector from which the left hand pointing originates. ie, point from this part to the target. -1 causes default offset for active weapon mode to be applied..
member.remarks: Default value = -1 Min value = -1 Max value = 21

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.RightHandParentOffset
member.summary: Sets the RightHandParentOffset setting for this Pointing-from offset from parent effector, expressed in spine3's frame, x = back/forward, y = right/left, z = up/down. This is added to the measured one if useIncomingTransforms=true and measureParentOffset=true. NB NOT used if rightHandParentEffector LT 0. Pistol(0,0,0) Rifle(0.0032, 0.0, -0.0).
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f)

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.RightHandParentEffector
member.summary: Sets the RightHandParentEffector setting for this 1 = Use rightShoulder.. Effector from which the right hand pointing originates. ie, point from this part to the target. -1 causes default offset for active weapon mode to be applied..
member.remarks: Default value = -1 Min value = -1 Max value = 21

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.PrimaryHandWeaponDistance
member.summary: Sets the PrimaryHandWeaponDistance setting for this Distance from the shoulder to hold the weapon. If -1 and useIncomingTransforms then weaponDistance is read from ITMs. weaponDistance=primaryHandWeaponDistance clamped [0.2f:m_maxArmReach=0.65] if useIncomingTransforms = false. pistol 0.60383, rifle 0.336.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ConstrainRifle
member.summary: Sets the ConstrainRifle setting for this Use hard constraint to keep rifle stock against shoulder?.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.RifleConstraintMinDistance
member.summary: Sets the RifleConstraintMinDistance setting for this Rifle constraint distance. Deliberately kept large to create a flat constraint surface where rifle meets the shoulder..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f Min value = 0.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.DisableArmCollisions
member.summary: Sets the DisableArmCollisions setting for this Disable collisions between right hand/forearm and the torso/legs..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.DisableRifleCollisions
member.summary: Sets the DisableRifleCollisions setting for this Disable collisions between right hand/forearm and spine3/spine2 if in rifle mode..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.Stiffness
member.summary: Sets the Stiffness setting for this Effector Stiffness. value feeds through to rollUp directly.
member.remarks: Default value = 11.0f Min value = 6.0f Max value = 16.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.Damping
member.summary: Sets the Damping setting for this Effector Damping..
member.remarks: Default value = 1.4f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 4.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.Forcemag
member.summary: Sets the Forcemag setting for this Helper force strength. Do not go above 1 for a rollDownStairs/roll along ground reaction..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.M_useArmToSlowDown
member.summary: Sets the M_useArmToSlowDown setting for this the degree to which the character will try to stop a barrel roll with his arms.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.9f Min value = -3.0f Max value = 3.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.UseZeroPose
member.summary: Sets the UseZeroPose setting for this Blends between a zeroPose and the Rollup, Faster the character is rotating the less the zeroPose.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.SpinWhenInAir
member.summary: Sets the SpinWhenInAir setting for this Applied cheat forces to spin the character when in the air, the forces are 40% of the forces applied when touching the ground. Be careful little bunny rabbits, the character could spin unnaturally in the air..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.M_armReachAmount
member.summary: Sets the M_armReachAmount setting for this how much the character reaches with his arms to brace against the ground.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.4f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 3.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.M_legPush
member.summary: Sets the M_legPush setting for this amount that the legs push outwards when tumbling.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.TryToAvoidHeadButtingGround
member.summary: Sets the TryToAvoidHeadButtingGround setting for this Blends between a zeroPose and the Rollup, Faster the character is rotating the less the zeroPose.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.ArmReachLength
member.summary: Sets the ArmReachLength setting for this the length that the arm reaches and so how much it straightens.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.CustomRollDir
member.summary: Sets the CustomRollDir setting for this pass in a custom direction in to have the character try and roll in that direction.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.UseCustomRollDir
member.summary: Sets the UseCustomRollDir setting for this pass in true to use the customRollDir parameter.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.StiffnessDecayTarget
member.summary: Sets the StiffnessDecayTarget setting for this The target linear velocity used to start the rolling..
member.remarks: Default value = 9.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.StiffnessDecayTime
member.summary: Sets the StiffnessDecayTime setting for this time, in seconds, to decay stiffness down to the stiffnessDecayTarget value (or -1 to disable).
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.AsymmetricalLegs
member.summary: Sets the AsymmetricalLegs setting for this 0 is no leg asymmetry in 'foetal' position. greater than 0 a asymmetricalLegs-rand(30%), added/minus each joint of the legs in radians. Random number changes about once every roll. 0.4 gives a lot of asymmetry.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.ZAxisSpinReduction
member.summary: Sets the ZAxisSpinReduction setting for this Tries to reduce the spin around the z axis. Scale 0 - 1.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.TargetLinearVelocityDecayTime
member.summary: Sets the TargetLinearVelocityDecayTime setting for this Time for the targetlinearVelocity to decay to zero..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.TargetLinearVelocity
member.summary: Sets the TargetLinearVelocity setting for this Helper torques are applied to match the spin of the character to the max of targetLinearVelocity and COMVelMag.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.OnlyApplyHelperForces
member.summary: Sets the OnlyApplyHelperForces setting for this Don't use rollup if true.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.UseRelativeVelocity
member.summary: Sets the UseRelativeVelocity setting for this useVelocityOfObjectBelow uses a relative velocity of the character to the object underneath.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.ApplyFoetalToLegs
member.summary: Sets the ApplyFoetalToLegs setting for this if true, use rollup for upper body and a kind of foetal behavior for legs.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.MovementLegsInFoetalPosition
member.summary: Sets the MovementLegsInFoetalPosition setting for this Only used if applyFoetalToLegs = true : define the variation of angles for the joints of the legs.

member.summary: Sets the MaxAngVel setting for this Only used if applyNewRollingCheatingTorques defined to true : maximal angular velocity of the roll to apply cheating torque.

member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.AllowInjuredArm
member.summary: Sets the AllowInjuredArm setting for this injured arm code runs if arm hit (turns and steps and bends injured arm).
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.AllowInjuredLeg
member.summary: Sets the AllowInjuredLeg setting for this when false injured leg is not bent and character does not bend to reach it.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.AllowInjuredLowerLegReach
member.summary: Sets the AllowInjuredLowerLegReach setting for this when false don't try to reach for injured Lower Legs (shins/feet).
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.AllowInjuredThighReach
member.summary: Sets the AllowInjuredThighReach setting for this when false don't try to reach for injured Thighs.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.StableHandsAndNeck
member.summary: Sets the StableHandsAndNeck setting for this additional stability for hands and neck (less loose).
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.Melee
member.summary: Sets the Melee setting for this
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.FallingReaction
member.summary: Sets the FallingReaction setting for this 0=Rollup, 1=Catchfall, 2=rollDownStairs, 3=smartFall.
member.remarks: Default value = 0 Min value = 0 Max value = 3

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.UseExtendedCatchFall
member.summary: Sets the UseExtendedCatchFall setting for this keep the character active instead of relaxing at the end of the catch fall.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.InitialWeaknessZeroDuration
member.summary: Sets the InitialWeaknessZeroDuration setting for this duration for which the character's upper body stays at minimum stiffness (not quite zero).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.InitialWeaknessRampDuration
member.summary: Sets the InitialWeaknessRampDuration setting for this duration of the ramp to bring the character's upper body stiffness back to normal levels.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.InitialNeckDuration
member.summary: Sets the InitialNeckDuration setting for this duration for which the neck stays at intial stiffness/damping.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.InitialNeckRampDuration
member.summary: Sets the InitialNeckRampDuration setting for this duration of the ramp to bring the neck stiffness/damping back to normal levels.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.UseCStrModulation
member.summary: Sets the UseCStrModulation setting for this if enabled upper and lower body strength scales with character strength, using the range given by parameters below.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.CStrUpperMin
member.summary: Sets the CStrUpperMin setting for this proportions to what the strength would be normally.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f Min value = 0.1f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.CStrUpperMax
member.summary: Sets the CStrUpperMax setting for this
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.1f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.CStrLowerMin
member.summary: Sets the CStrLowerMin setting for this
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f Min value = 0.1f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.CStrLowerMax
member.summary: Sets the CStrLowerMax setting for this
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.1f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.DeathTime
member.summary: Sets the DeathTime setting for this time to death (HACK for underwater). If -ve don't ever die.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 1000.0f

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotNewBulletHelper
member.summary: Send new wound information to the shot. Can cause shot to restart it's performance in part or in whole.

member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ShotNewBulletHelper for sending a ShotNewBullet to a given

member.remarks: Send new wound information to the shot. Can cause shot to restart it's performance in part or in whole.

member.summary: Sets the BodyPart setting for this part ID on the body where the bullet hit.
member.remarks: Default value = 0 Min value = 0 Max value = 21

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotNewBulletHelper.LocalHitPointInfo
member.summary: Sets the LocalHitPointInfo setting for this if true then normal and hitPoint should be supplied in local coordinates of bodyPart. If false then normal and hitPoint should be supplied in World coordinates.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotNewBulletHelper.Normal

member.summary: Sets the BulletVel setting for this bullet velocity in world coordinates.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.Snap
member.summary: Sets the Snap setting for this Add a Snap to shot..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapMag
member.summary: Sets the SnapMag setting for this The magnitude of the reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f Min value = -10.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapMovingMult
member.summary: Sets the SnapMovingMult setting for this movingMult*snapMag = The magnitude of the reaction if moving(comVelMag) faster than movingThresh.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapBalancingMult
member.summary: Sets the SnapBalancingMult setting for this balancingMult*snapMag = The magnitude of the reaction if balancing = (not lying on the floor/ not upper body not collided) and not airborne.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapAirborneMult
member.summary: Sets the SnapAirborneMult setting for this airborneMult*snapMag = The magnitude of the reaction if airborne.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapMovingThresh
member.summary: Sets the SnapMovingThresh setting for this If moving(comVelMag) faster than movingThresh then mvingMult applied to stunMag.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 20.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotSnapHelper.SnapDirectionRandomness
member.summary: Sets the SnapDirectionRandomness setting for this The character snaps in a prescribed way (decided by bullet direction) - Higher the value the more random this direction is..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.summary: Sets the SnapRightLeg setting for this snap the rightLeg..

member.summary: Sets the SnapUseBulletDir setting for this Legs are either in phase with each other or not.

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper
member.summary: configure the shockSpin effect in shot. Spin/Lift the character using cheat torques/forces

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ShotShockSpinHelper for sending a ShotShockSpin to a given
member.param: The to send the ShotShockSpin to.
member.remarks: configure the shockSpin effect in shot. Spin/Lift the character using cheat torques/forces

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.AddShockSpin
member.summary: Sets the AddShockSpin setting for this if enabled, add a short 'shock' of torque to the character's spine to exaggerate bullet impact.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.RandomizeShockSpinDirection
member.summary: Sets the RandomizeShockSpinDirection setting for this for use with close-range shotgun blasts, or similar.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.AlwaysAddShockSpin
member.summary: Sets the AlwaysAddShockSpin setting for this if true, apply the shock spin no matter which body component was hit. otherwise only apply if the spine or clavicles get hit.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinMin
member.summary: Sets the ShockSpinMin setting for this minimum amount of torque to add if using shock-spin feature.
member.remarks: Default value = 50.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1000.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinMax
member.summary: Sets the ShockSpinMax setting for this maxiumum amount of torque to add if using shock-spin feature.
member.remarks: Default value = 90.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1000.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinLiftForceMult
member.summary: Sets the ShockSpinLiftForceMult setting for this if greater than 0, apply a force to lift the character up while the torque is applied, trying to produce a dramatic spun/twist shotgun-to-the-chest effect. this is a scale of the torque applied, so 8.0 or so would give a reasonable amount of lift.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinDecayMult
member.summary: Sets the ShockSpinDecayMult setting for this multiplier used when decaying torque spin over time.
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 10.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinScalePerComponent
member.summary: Sets the ShockSpinScalePerComponent setting for this torque applied is scaled by this amount across the spine components - spine2 recieving the full amount, then 3 and 1 and finally 0. each time, this value is used to scale it down. 0.5 means half the torque each time..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinMaxTwistVel
member.summary: Sets the ShockSpinMaxTwistVel setting for this shock spin ends when twist velocity is greater than this value (try 6.0). If set to -1 does not stop.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 200.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinScaleByLeverArm
member.summary: Sets the ShockSpinScaleByLeverArm setting for this shock spin scales by lever arm of bullet i.e. bullet impact point to centre line.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinAirMult
member.summary: Sets the ShockSpinAirMult setting for this shockSpin's torque is multipied by this value when both the character's feet are not in contact.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpin1FootMult
member.summary: Sets the ShockSpin1FootMult setting for this shockSpin's torque is multipied by this value when the one of the character's feet are not in contact.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinFootGripMult
member.summary: Sets the ShockSpinFootGripMult setting for this shockSpin scales the torques applied to the feet by footSlipCompensation.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.BracedSideSpinMult
member.summary: Sets the BracedSideSpinMult setting for this If shot on a side with a forward foot and both feet are on the ground and balanced, increase the shockspin to compensate for the balancer naturally resisting spin to that side.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 1.0f Max value = 5.0f

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper
member.summary: configure the fall to knees shot.

member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ShotFallToKneesHelper for sending a ShotFallToKnees to a given

member.remarks: configure the fall to knees shot.

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FallToKnees
member.summary: Sets the FallToKnees setting for this Type of reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkAlwaysChangeFall
member.summary: Sets the FtkAlwaysChangeFall setting for this Always change fall behaviour. If false only change when falling forward.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkBalanceTime
member.summary: Sets the FtkBalanceTime setting for this How long the balancer runs for before fallToKnees starts.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 5.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkHelperForce
member.summary: Sets the FtkHelperForce setting for this Hip helper force magnitude - to help character lean over balance point of line between toes.
member.remarks: Default value = 200.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 2000.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkHelperForceOnSpine
member.summary: Sets the FtkHelperForceOnSpine setting for this Helper force applied to spine3 aswell.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkLeanHelp
member.summary: Sets the FtkLeanHelp setting for this Help balancer lean amount - to help character lean over balance point of line between toes. Half of this is also applied as hipLean.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 0.3f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkSpineBend
member.summary: Sets the FtkSpineBend setting for this Bend applied to spine when falling from knees. (+ve forward - try -0.1) (only if rds called).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = -0.2f Max value = 0.3f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkStiffSpine
member.summary: Sets the FtkStiffSpine setting for this Stiffen spine when falling from knees (only if rds called).
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkImpactLooseness
member.summary: Sets the FtkImpactLooseness setting for this Looseness (muscleStiffness = 1.01f - m_parameters.ftkImpactLooseness) applied to upperBody on knee impacts.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkImpactLoosenessTime
member.summary: Sets the FtkImpactLoosenessTime setting for this Time that looseness is applied after knee impacts.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f Min value = -0.1f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkBendRate
member.summary: Sets the FtkBendRate setting for this Rate at which the legs are bent to go from standing to on knees.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 4.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkHipBlend
member.summary: Sets the FtkHipBlend setting for this Blend from current hip to balancing on knees hip angle.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkLungeProb
member.summary: Sets the FtkLungeProb setting for this Probability that a lunge reaction will be allowed.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkKneeSpin
member.summary: Sets the FtkKneeSpin setting for this When on knees allow some spinning of the character. If false then the balancers' footSlipCompensation remains on and tends to keep the character facing the same way as when it was balancing..
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkFricMult
member.summary: Sets the FtkFricMult setting for this Multiplier on the reduction of friction for the feet based on angle away from horizontal - helps the character fall to knees quicker.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 5.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkHipAngleFall
member.summary: Sets the FtkHipAngleFall setting for this Apply this hip angle when the character starts to fall backwards when on knees.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 1.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkPitchForwards
member.summary: Sets the FtkPitchForwards setting for this Hip pitch applied (+ve forward, -ve backwards) if character is falling forwards on way down to it's knees.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f Min value = -0.5f Max value = 0.5f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkPitchBackwards
member.summary: Sets the FtkPitchBackwards setting for this Hip pitch applied (+ve forward, -ve backwards) if character is falling backwards on way down to it's knees.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f Min value = -0.5f Max value = 0.5f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkFallBelowStab
member.summary: Sets the FtkFallBelowStab setting for this Balancer instability below which the character starts to bend legs even if it isn't going to fall on to it's knees (i.e. if going backwards). 0.3 almost ensures a fall to knees but means the character will keep stepping backward until it slows down enough..
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 15.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkBalanceAbortThreshold
member.summary: Sets the FtkBalanceAbortThreshold setting for this when the character gives up and goes into a fall.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f Min value = 0.0f Max value = 4.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkOnKneesArmType
member.summary: Sets the FtkOnKneesArmType setting for this Type of arm response when on knees falling forward 0=useFallArms (from RollDownstairs or catchFall), 1= armsIn, 2=armsOut.
member.remarks: Default value = 2 Min value = 0 Max value = 2

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkReleaseReachForWound
member.summary: Sets the FtkReleaseReachForWound setting for this Release the reachForWound this amount of time after the knees have hit. If LT 0.0 then keep reaching for wound regardless of fall/onground state..
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f Min value = -1.0f Max value = 5.0f

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkReachForWound
member.summary: Sets the FtkReachForWound setting for this true = Keep reaching for wound regardless of fall/onground state. false = respect the shotConfigureArms params: reachFalling, reachFallingWithOneHand, reachOnFloor.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkReleasePointGun
member.summary: Sets the FtkReleasePointGun setting for this Override the pointGun when knees hit.
member.remarks: Default value = False

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkFailMustCollide
member.summary: Sets the FtkFailMustCollide setting for this The upper body of the character must be colliding and other failure conditions met to fail.
member.remarks: Default value = True

member.name: T:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotInGutsHelper
member.summary: configure the shot in guts reaction

member.name: M:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotInGutsHelper.#ctor(GTA.Ped)

member.param: The to send the ShotInGuts to.
member.remarks: configure the shot in guts reaction

member.name: P:GTA.NaturalMotion.ShotInGutsHelper.ShotInGuts
member.summary: Sets the ShotInGuts setting for this Type of reaction.
